body_html:
To explain the motivation for this PR better:
If I try to supply the "init" node in outputNames instead of adding it as a target node, I get the following error:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Tried to fetch data for 'init:0', which produces no output.  To run to a node but not fetch any data, pass 'init:0' as an argument to the 'target_node_names' argument of the Session::Run API
body_text:
To explain the motivation for this PR better:
If I try to supply the "init" node in outputNames instead of adding it as a target node, I get the following error:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Tried to fetch data for 'init:0', which produces no output.  To run to a node but not fetch any data, pass 'init:0' as an argument to the 'target_node_names' argument of the Session::Run API
body:
To explain the motivation for this PR better:
If I try to supply the "init" node in `outputNames` instead of adding it as a target node, I get the following error:

    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Tried to fetch data for 'init:0', which produces no output.  To run to a node but not fetch any data, pass 'init:0' as an argument to the 'target_node_names' argument of the Session::Run API
